name: Template Button 1
html:
[wprm-recipe-jump style="inline-button" icon="" horizontal_padding="20px" button_color="#f54242" border_radius="8px" text_color="#ffffff" icon_color="#ffffff" vertical_padding="11px" text_style="normal" smooth_scroll="1" border_color="#f54242"]
[wprm-recipe-jump-video style="inline-button" icon="" horizontal_padding="20px" button_color="#ffffff" border_radius="8px" text_color="#f54242" icon_color="#ffffff" vertical_padding="11px" border_color="#f54242" smooth_scroll="1"]
[wprm-recipe-print icon="" style="inline-button" horizontal_padding="20px" button_color="#f54242" border_radius="8px" text_color="#ffffff" icon_color="#ffffff" vertical_padding="11px" border_color="#f54242"]
